attributes.action: David Cameron to resign over immigration as stated in contract
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron signed a contract with the British people stating he would resign if he never lowered immigration to the level it was before 2010 and he should now stand by his word for the first time in his courier and fulfill his contract to the British people and resign
attributes.background: David Cameron to resign over immigration amounts as he stated in his contract and failing to stop and lower immigration as he promised he would

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
